date: Fri, 25 Feb 2022 17:50:31 +0000
message-id: <%s>
mime-version: 1.0
content-type: text/plain; charset="utf-8"
content-transfer-encoding: quoted-printable

text body

<<< body2.txt
date: Fri, 25 Feb 2022 17:50:31 +0000
message-id: <%s>

content-type: text/plain; charset="utf-8"
content-transfer-encoding: quoted-printable

new text body
